Race.SpecificTitle: City of Tallulah Prop.#1 -- 8.81 Mills - CC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
City of Tallulah Propositions

Proposition No. 1
(Streets, Roads and Drainage - Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 8.81 mills property tax renewal for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, maintaining and/or improving public streets, roads and drainage facilities within the City.
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Tallulah, Parish of Madison, State of Louisiana (the "City"), renew and levy a special tax of eight and eighty-one hundredths (8.81) mills on the dollar on all the property subject to taxation in the City (an estimated $131,316.50 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2011 and ending with the year 2020, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, maintaining and/or improving public streets, roads and drainage facilities within the City?

Race.SpecificTitle: City of Tallulah Prop.#2 -- 9.34 Mills - CC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
City of Tallulah Propositions

Proposition No. 2
(General Purposes - Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 9.34 mills property tax renewal for general purposes.
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Tallulah, Parish of Madison, State of Louisiana (the "City"), renew and levy a special tax of nine and thirty-four hundredths (9.34) mills on the dollar on all the property subject to taxation in the City (an estimated $139,216.36 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2011 and ending with the year 2020, for general purposes?
